attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: James Armstrong is a man of honour who has dedicated his life to helping the needy and the dammed. weather it be helping lepers in caves, or giving that tramp a bottle of lager to keep his buzz going, hes always being there.He is an extremely well-respected member of his community,well known for his acts of kindness and generosity, so give this great wise man the reward he has earned, not least for his chiseled features and his sporting prowess.He would also make sure that notorious village pervert Michael Kynman was brought to justice.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
